summary.body: After slowly dying over the past year, my video recorder has finally packed up. Although I guess I could dispose of it in the rubbish skip in the car-park, I was wondering if there was  a special service for recycling electrical items. A lot of local councils run these schemes, partially to stop landfills getting contaminated with nasties, and also to recycle scrap copper etc. On another point, I'm going to replace my elderly computer soon. It seems a pity to just throw it away as it still works perfectly well, although it's not up to the demands of running today's software. Does anybody know if there's any charity or similar who would be interested in taking it? Cheers, Charles.
summary.subject: Recycling electrical items
